name: anta-api
description:
Anta is a multi-functional self hosted media streaming service. [Check this demo video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XggPtIFNnFw) / [#2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F4RvdVo_5BM) ## Feature - Supports video, music streaming
- Video streaming with automatic subtitle detection within same folder
- Subtitle converter for any subtitle to vtt(to provide subtitle on the streaming video) within same folder
- Swipable image viewer
- Responsive UI design
- Works on http2 protocol - Groupwatch feature (sync a video between two users, experimental)
author: One Sik Oh
